attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: give more money to local councils to provide a better fully trained service to the vulnerable, elderly people who need care in their own homes. We have all seen the panorama programme. These elderly people need dignity. PROVIDE THE FUNDING (Please). The people we saw on the panorama programme are the lucky ones. My mum died because of neglect. Help them because they need our voice.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
